column1: Lethuin is a Silvan Elves Elves of the Woodland Realm in the The Hobbit (film series)
Lethuin helped capture Thorin and Company while they were in Mirkwood
column2: and was later seen in the cellar conversing with Galion while Bilbo Baggins was searching for a means of helping the Dwarves escape.

column1: Lethuin is obviously an anagram of the canonical name LÃºthien (the same way certain other background characters were given names of that nature throughout the Peter Jackson films). However
column2: there is no actual background or etymology behind it.
